name: Aware
description:
✨Illustration No. 3 Series: Daydreaming ✨

✨For Japanese culture, the word "aware" is a deep feeling provoked by the ephemeral beauty of nature. To feel it we must be present in body and soul to give it the value that something apparently insignificant has. A breeze of wind moving the grass, the shimmer of sand on the seashore, the flight of a butterfly from one flower to another.

Something that somehow resembles daydreaming.✨

I hope you like it.

Have a beautiful day.

Martin

@thedominguez_ok
2021

✨👁✨
